syllabus_info.syllabus_name: Cambridge International AS & A Level Computer Science 9618

learning_objectives.description: Show understanding of how graphs can be used to aid Artificial Intelligence (AI) (Purpose and structure of a graph; Use A* and Dijkstra's algorithms to perform searches on a graph; Candidates will not be required to write algorithms to set up, access, or perform searches on graphs)
Show understanding of how artificial neural networks have helped with machine learning

Show understanding of Deep Learning, Machine Learning and Reinforcement Learning and the reasons for using these methods. (Understand machine learning categories, including supervised learning, unsupervised learning)
Show understanding of back propagation of errors and regression methods in machine learning
